summary: National Academy of Sciences  is United States corporation whose members serve as advisers to the nation on science.
full_text:
The National Research Council  is the working arm of the United States National Academies, which produces reports that shape policies, inform public opinion, and advance the pursuit of science, engineering, and medicine.
The National Academies include:
National Academy of Sciences 
National Academy of Engineering 
Institute of Medicine 
Unlike the other three organizations of the National Academies, the National Research Council is not a membership organization.
title: United States National Research Council
